languages.text: "Но это поначалу. А потом комендант решил что, мол, за наказаниями тоже должны следить оптиматы, а не охрана. И работу контролировать оптиматы, а не надзиратели. Ну они тут развернулись, я скажу! Ни один охранник так не зверствовал, как наши дорогие дружочки. При старых порядках у нас, может, пяток-десяток человек только дох в неделю, а при новых — начали отлетать по полсотни, а то и больше".

traits.locale_text: "Но это поначалу. А потом комендант решил что, мол, за наказаниями тоже должны следить оптиматы, а не охрана. И работу контролировать оптиматы, а не надзиратели. Ну они тут развернулись, я скажу! Ни один охранник так не зверствовал, как наши дорогие дружочки. При старых порядках у нас, может, пяток-десяток человек только дох в неделю, а при новых — начали отлетать по полсотни, а то и больше".

languages.text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."
languages.original_text: "Но это поначалу. А потом комендант решил что, мол, за наказаниями тоже должны следить оптиматы, а не охрана. И работу контролировать оптиматы, а не надзиратели. Ну они тут развернулись, я скажу! Ни один охранник так не зверствовал, как наши дорогие дружочки. При старых порядках у нас, может, пяток-десяток человек только дох в неделю, а при новых — начали отлетать по полсотни, а то и больше".

traits.locale_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when our goody two-shoes really shined! No guard had ever been as brutal to us as our dear fellows. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs a week, and now it was half a hundred if not more."

"Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when our goody two-shoes really shined! No guard had ever been as brutal to us as our dear fellows. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs a week, and now it was half a hundred if not more."

The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was half a hundred."

And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was half a hundred."

The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

"Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

languages.text: «O así fue al principio. Luego el alcaide decidió que eran los optimates, no los guardias, quienes debían encargarse de los castigos. Y que no era tarea de los supervisores vigilar el trabajo de los prisioneros, sino de los optimates. Y ¿sabe qué? ¡Fue ahí cuando estos santurrones empezaron a destacar! Los guardias no están en la misma liga que nuestros queridos compañeros, los optimates, desde luego. Antes, había como cinco o diez que acababan fiambre a la semana, y ahora, bueno, teníamos suerte si eran solo cincuenta».
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: «O así fue al principio. Luego el alcaide decidió que eran los optimates, no los guardias, quienes debían encargarse de los castigos. Y que no era tarea de los supervisores vigilar el trabajo de los prisioneros, sino de los optimates. Y ¿sabe qué? ¡Fue ahí cuando estos santurrones empezaron a destacar! Los guardias no están en la misma liga que nuestros queridos compañeros, los optimates, desde luego. Antes, había como cinco o diez que acababan fiambre a la semana, y ahora, bueno, teníamos suerte si eran solo cincuenta».

languages.text: "Zumindest war es anfangs so. Dann hat der Direktor entschieden, dass es die Optimaten sind, nicht die Wächter, die für die Strafen zuständig sein sollten. Und dass es nicht Aufgabe der Aufseher ist, die Arbeit der Gefangenen zu überwachen — sondern Augabe der Optimaten. Nun, ich sage Euch: Da haben diese Tugendbolde dann erst richtig geglänzt! Die Wachen spielen nicht einmal in derselben Liga wie unsere lieben Kameraden, die Optimaten. Früher sind pro Woche vielleicht fünf bis zehn Leute verreckt, und jetzt, tja, jetzt hatten wir schon Glück, wenn es nur fünfzig waren."
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: "Zumindest war es anfangs so. Dann hat der Direktor entschieden, dass es die Optimaten sind, nicht die Wächter, die für die Strafen zuständig sein sollten. Und dass es nicht Aufgabe der Aufseher ist, die Arbeit der Gefangenen zu überwachen — sondern Augabe der Optimaten. Nun, ich sage Euch: Da haben diese Tugendbolde dann erst richtig geglänzt! Die Wachen spielen nicht einmal in derselben Liga wie unsere lieben Kameraden, die Optimaten. Früher sind pro Woche vielleicht fünf bis zehn Leute verreckt, und jetzt, tja, jetzt hatten wir schon Glück, wenn es nur fünfzig waren."

languages.text: « Enfin, au début, en tout cas. Au bout d'un certain temps, le directeur a décidé de confier les punitions aux élus, plutôt qu'aux gardes. Et puis les superviseurs n'ont plus été chargés de surveiller le travail des prisonniers ; là aussi, c'était les élus, et très franchement, ces culs-bénis attendaient rien de plus pour se mettre à faire des étincelles ! Mais les gardes, à côté, on peut dire que c'était des enfants de chœur : de leur temps, on se prenait peut-être cinq à dix raclées par semaine, alors qu'aujourd'hui, on a de la chance si ça s'arrête à cinquante. »
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin, au début, en tout cas. Au bout d'un certain temps, le directeur a décidé de confier les punitions aux élus, plutôt qu'aux gardes. Et puis les superviseurs n'ont plus été chargés de surveiller le travail des prisonniers ; là aussi, c'était les élus, et très franchement, ces culs-bénis attendaient rien de plus pour se mettre à faire des étincelles ! Mais les gardes, à côté, on peut dire que c'était des enfants de chœur : de leur temps, on se prenait peut-être cinq à dix raclées par semaine, alors qu'aujourd'hui, on a de la chance si ça s'arrête à cinquante. »

languages.text: “或者说，一开始是那个样子。后来，典狱长决定让那些‘典范’代替看守，处罚犯人，还让他们代替工头来监工。这下好了，那群狐假虎威的家伙可算是得势了！我们的这些‘典范’好伙计，下手可比那些看守黑多了。以前我们一周最多也就死上五到十个，可现在，每周死的人只要不超过五十个，就已经算撞大运了。”
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: “或者说，一开始是那个样子。后来，典狱长决定让那些‘典范’代替看守，处罚犯人，还让他们代替工头来监工。这下好了，那群狐假虎威的家伙可算是得势了！我们的这些‘典范’好伙计，下手可比那些看守黑多了。以前我们一周最多也就死上五到十个，可现在，每周死的人只要不超过五十个，就已经算撞大运了。”

languages.text: 「最初はそんな感じだった。その後、所長は処罰担当を看守ではなくオプティメイトにすると決めた。それから囚人の仕事を監視するのも刑務官ではなく…オプティメイトの役割になった。でも聞いてくれ。このお人好し連中が本当に輝き出したのはそのときだったんだぜ！俺たちの親愛なる仲間であるオプティメイトに比べりゃ看守なんて足元にも及ばない。昔は、週にだいたい5〜10人のほどの囚人がくたばっていたんだが、今はまぁ、50人いたらまだましなほうだな」
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: 「それか、最初はそうだったんだ。その後所長は、処罰担当を看守ではなくオプティマテスにすると決めた。それから囚人の仕事を監視するのは刑務官の役割ではなく…オプティマテスの役割になった。なぁ、言っとくけど、あのいい子ちゃんがえらく輝き出したのはそのタイミングだぜ！看守なんて、俺達の素敵なお仲間のオプティマテスの足元にも及ばない。昔は、作業場には週にだいたい5〜10人のほどの作業員がいたよ。まぁ、今は全部で50人いたら幸運だよ」

「最初はそんな感じだった。その後、所長は処罰担当を看守ではなくオプティメイトにすると決めた。それから囚人の仕事を監視するのも刑務官ではなく…オプティメイトの役割になった。でも聞いてくれ。このお人好し連中が本当に輝き出したのはそのときだったんだぜ！俺たちの親愛なる仲間であるオプティメイトに比べりゃ看守なんて足元にも及ばない。昔は、週にだいたい5〜10人のほどの囚人がくたばっていたんだが、今はまぁ、50人いたらまだましなほうだな」

languages.text: "En azından başta öyleydi. Sonra müdür, cezalardan gardiyanların değil de optimatelerin sorumlu olması gerektiğine karar verdi. Neymiş efendim, mahkûmların çalışmasını izlemek de gözetmenlerin değil, optimatelerin görevi olacakmış. Groksun kuyruğu işte orada koptu, o iyilik abideleri asıl yüzlerini o zaman gösterdi! Gardiyanlar, sevgili dostlarımız optimatelerin yanına bile yanaşamaz. Eskiden haftada en fazla beş ya da on kişi nalları dikerdi. Şimdiyse elli kişi gidince iyi diyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Or that's how it was at first. Then the warden decided it's the optimates, not the guards, who should be in charge of punishments. And that it wasn't the overseers' job to watch the prisoners work — it was the optimates'. Well, let me tell you: that's when these goody two-shoes really started to shine! The guards aren't even in the same league as our dear fellows, the optimates. In the old days, we had maybe five or ten stiffs kicking it a week, and now, well now we were lucky if it was only fifty."

traits.locale_text: "En azından başta öyleydi. Sonra müdür, cezalardan gardiyanların değil de optimatelerin sorumlu olması gerektiğine karar verdi. Neymiş efendim, mahkûmların çalışmasını izlemek de gözetmenlerin değil, optimatelerin görevi olacakmış. Groksun kuyruğu işte orada koptu, o iyilik abideleri asıl yüzlerini o zaman gösterdi! Gardiyanlar, sevgili dostlarımız optimatelerin yanına bile yanaşamaz. Eskiden haftada en fazla beş ya da on kişi nalları dikerdi. Şimdiyse elli kişi gidince iyi diyoruz."
